sentences.english: When they're discovered, Cleopatra is dead, and her handmaidens are dying.
sentences.chinese: 先是克利奧帕特拉，然後是她的兩位女僕。

sentences.english: She reproved the maid in an angry voice for breaking the dish.
sentences.chinese: 她對打碎盤子的女僕大聲叱喝。

sentences.english: Raoul, the doctor, the maid and Christine were the only ones left in the room.
sentences.chinese: 屋裏只剩下拉烏爾，醫生，女僕和克莉斯汀。

sentences.english: Reaching the number, he hurried up the steps and did not spare the bell in waking the servant.
sentences.chinese: 到了公寓，他急忙跨上臺階，照舊按鈴叫醒了女僕。

sentences.english: Finally one day she hid the playboy in her covered flower basket.
sentences.chinese: 一天女僕終於將花花公子藏在了大花籃裏。

sentences.english: A lady employed a maid-servant being very stupid.
sentences.chinese: 一位太太僱了一個愚蠢的女僕。

sentences.english: The maid clattered the pots and pans in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 女僕嘩啦嘩啦地在廚房的水槽裏洗鍋碗。
那女僕打入瑪麗家爲同夥日後行竊踩點。

sentences.english: The servant girl was blasted by her boss .
sentences.chinese: 女僕受到其上司的嚴責。

sentences.english: Our housemaid does everything except wash the car.
sentences.chinese: 除了洗刷汽車之外，我們的女僕人什麼都做。

sentences.english: Christine looked at the doctor and the maid and they all laughed.
sentences.chinese: 克莉斯汀看看醫生，又看看女僕，他們都笑了。

sentences.english: Our dear hero, please revive Your maidservants with the nectar of Your lips.
sentences.chinese: 我們親愛的英雄，請用禰嘴脣的甘露令禰的女僕復活。

sentences.english: Among them generally were female domestic servants and female apprentices.
sentences.chinese: 女僕大致包括女家僕以及女學徒兩類。

sentences.english: She is role-playing the maidservant in our home.
sentences.chinese: 她在我們家裏扮演着女僕的角色。

definition: photobook (loanword from Japanese), generally sexy portraits of an actress or model
to take a screen test/to audition/screen test/audition/tryout
cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
loved by all/to have universal appeal
